entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. Temperature steady near 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 7.
